scripts.build: npm ci && rimraf build && tsc *.ts && tsc && npm pack
scripts.dev: clear && nodemon -q --watch src --exec node --loader ts-node/esm --inspect src/index.ts | npm run pretty-log
scripts.dev:verbose: clear && nodemon --watch src --exec node --loader ts-node/esm --inspect src/index.ts
scripts.clean-build: rm **/*.js && rm *.js && rm **/*.d.ts && rm *.d.ts && rm **/*.d.ts.map && rm *.d.ts.map
